LanguageData.RepeatableResearch.EnableResearchGlobalW: Enable Research on Global Workspeed Boost
If ticked, will make the repeatable research available to increase the gobal work speed.
LanguageData.RepeatableResearch.SettingsPanelChangeSe: Enabling or disabling research options will require a game restart. If you disable an already researched technology in your running game, then you may ignore the errors while loading the game savegame up for the first time.
